numbered_ace_sentences: 2. People of color dominate the field.
3. People of color are less often leaders of the whole team.
4. People of color are less often coaches of the whole team.
5. I wonder if someone does this purposely.
6. I wonder how the players feel.
7. A player can be led by a leader.
8. A leader can be someone that the player cannot relate to.
9. A leader can be someone that does not have the same experiences as the player.
10. This situation could have a big impact on the way we see ourselves.
11. I live in an area that is filled with people of color.
12. In this area, we see a lack of representation in higher-up positions.
13. The graph could make people around me believe something.
14. The graph could make people around me believe that they cannot be a coach.
15. The graph could make people around me believe that they cannot get a better job.
16. The headline is: Difference in positions for people of color on the sports field.
